name: GitHub
description: Dive into the source code of my projects, check out my coding style, and track my activity and contributions.

name: Linkedin
description: Connect with me professionally. My LinkedIn provides a comprehensive overview of my work history, skills, and education.

name: Facebook
description: Another way to connect on a personal basis. I primarily use this platform to follow topics and communities I'm interested in.

name: X
description: See what I'm reading and who I'm following. I use X to keep a pulse on the tech world and influential voices in the industry.

name: HackerRank
description: A showcase of my problem-solving abilities. View my badges and proficiency in algorithms and data structures.
